item.description:
http://www.facebook.c...


Saturday, November 13 · 2:00pm - 6:00pm

Rock Spot Climbing Boston
67 Sprague St
Boston, MA

Giant Gear demo, sale, and fund raising festival!

"Main Stage"
Demos by: Petzl • Five Ten • NE Ropes • Gibbon • Evolv • Mammut
(brands subject to change due to schedule)

"Merch Tent"
25% off Entire store* for members • 20% off entire store* for non-members • 25% off all special orders • Free raffle ticket for every $20 spent in store or memberships • *Not valid on clearance items

"Member Garden"
Lost & Found “yard Sale” (money raised for Team Rock Spot) • Member sale/swap booths (Sell your stuff!)

To sell items at the swap, or display your art to the masses, please see Kat or Justin at the desk.
item.name: GEARAPALOOZA!!!!
